text: Hey there and good morning! How are you doing today?
i am great, thanks
Good to hear!  I am in Virginia, where abouts are you from?
I am in NC
Oh nice! Not too far away at all.  Do you have a lot of homeless people in your area?
Not to many, some i'm sure.q
There are quite a few not too far from me which is sad.  I often donate to the local shelters and such to try and help the ones that appreciate it.
That is very generous of you.  I donate to some charities as well.
Very nice and thank you! Same to you :)  It says that we can donate part of our payment towards Save the Children.
Really, do you know much about that organization?
I know a bit about them, I have donated to them in the past actually.  Here is the direct website  URL
Ok, I will have to go check them out and read up on them.
The one nice thing about them is that a very small percent goes to administrative stuff where others are ridiculous and greedy.
That is good to hear.  I hate when the charity only gets a small % of the money.
Would you like to donate some of your earnings from this HIT? I was going to donate .75
I am willing to donate some to
Awesome!! It doesn't take much to help, it states that .77 a day can shelter a family which is nuts!
OK, I think I will donate 50 cents today.
Perfect I am sure the children will thank both of us, a little gesture goes a long way!
Yes, thank you very much for letting me know about it.
Thank you! Hope you have a fun filled day!
